Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to the New York state thoroughbred breeding and development fund
Summary: Increases the excess limit for funds in the New York state thoroughbred breeding and development fund from seventy-five thousand dollars to five hundred thousand dollars.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the New York state thoroughbred breeding and development fund
